item.title: Google Bard - Prompt Injection to Data Exfiltration
item.description: Recently Google Bard got some powerful updates, including Extensions. They allow Bard to access YouTube, search for flights and hotels, but also to access a user’s personal documents and emails. So, Bard can access and analyze your Drive, Docs and Gmail! When Extensions shipped I was able to quickly validate that Indirect Prompt Injection works by pointing Bard to some older YouTube videos I had put up and ask it to summarize the titles, and it also worked with Google Docs.
